verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w fifth|strong="G3991"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w sounded|strong="G4537"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* a \w star|strong="G0792"\w* \w fall|strong="G4098"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* the \w key|strong="G2807"\w* of the \w bottomless|strong="G0012"\w* \w pit|strong="G5421"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* the \w bottomless|strong="G0012"\w* \w pit|strong="G5421"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w arose|strong="G0305"\w* a \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* of the \w pit|strong="G5421"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w* of a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w furnace|strong="G2575"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w air|strong="G0109"\w* were \w darkened|strong="G4654"\w* by \w reason|strong="G1537"\w* of the \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w* of the \w pit|strong="G5421"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w came|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* of the \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w* \w locusts|strong="G0200"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w scorpions|strong="G4651"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it was \w commanded|strong="G4483"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they \w should|strong="G0091"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w hurt|strong="G0091"\w* the \w grass|strong="G5528"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* green \w thing|strong="G5515"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w tree|strong="G1186"\w*; \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w* \w those|strong="G3748"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* which \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w seal|strong="G4973"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w foreheads|strong="G3359"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w* it was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they \w should|strong="G0615"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w kill|strong="G0615"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they should be \w tormented|strong="G0928"\w* \w five|strong="G4002"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w torment|strong="G0929"\w* \add was\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w torment|strong="G0929"\w* of a \w scorpion|strong="G4651"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* he \w striketh|strong="G3817"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G1565"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w shall|strong="G2212"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w desire|strong="G1937"\w* to \w die|strong="G0599"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* shall \w flee|strong="G5343"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w shapes|strong="G3667"\w* of the \w locusts|strong="G0200"\w* \add were\add* like \w unto|strong="G3664"\w* \w horses|strong="G2462"\w* \w prepared|strong="G2090"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w battle|strong="G4171"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w* \add were\add* as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* \w crowns|strong="G4735"\w* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* \w gold|strong="G5557"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w faces|strong="G4383"\w* \add were\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w faces|strong="G4383"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w hair|strong="G2359"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w hair|strong="G2359"\w* of \w women|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w teeth|strong="G3599"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \add the teeth\add* of \w lions|strong="G3023"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w breastplates|strong="G2382"\w*, as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* \w breastplates|strong="G2382"\w* of \w iron|strong="G4603"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sound|strong="G5456"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w wings|strong="G4420"\w* \add was\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w sound|strong="G5456"\w* of \w chariots|strong="G0716"\w* of \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w horses|strong="G2462"\w* \w running|strong="G5143"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w battle|strong="G4171"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w tails|strong="G3769"\w* like \w unto|strong="G3664"\w* \w scorpions|strong="G4651"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w stings|strong="G2759"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w tails|strong="G3769"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \add  \+w was|strong="G0091"\+w*\add* to \w hurt|strong="G0091"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w five|strong="G4002"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w had|strong="G2192"\w* a \w king|strong="G0935"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \add which is\add* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the bottomless \w pit|strong="G0012"\w*, whose \w name|strong="G3686"\w* in the Hebrew \w tongue|strong="G1447"\w* \add is\add* \w Abaddon|strong="G0003"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the Greek \w tongue|strong="G1673"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \add  \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w*\add* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w Apollyon|strong="G0623"\w*.

\w One|strong="G1520"\w* \w woe|strong="G3759"\w* is \w past|strong="G0565"\w*; \add and\add*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, there \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w woes|strong="G3759"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* \w hereafter|strong="G3326"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w sounded|strong="G4537"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w a|strong="G1520"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w horns|strong="G2768"\w* of the \w golden|strong="G5552"\w* \w altar|strong="G2379"\w* which is \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w* to the \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w trumpet|strong="G4536"\w*, \w Loose|strong="G3089"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w river|strong="G4215"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="G2166"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* were \w loosed|strong="G3089"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* were \w prepared|strong="G2090"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* an \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w month|strong="G3376"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w year|strong="G1763"\w*, for \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w slay|strong="G0615"\w* the third \w part|strong="G5154"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w number|strong="G0706"\w* of the \w army|strong="G4753"\w* of the \w horsemen|strong="G2461"\w* \add were\add* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* hundred \w thousand|strong="G3461"\w* \w thousand|strong="G3461"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* the \w number|strong="G0706"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w thus|strong="G3779"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* the \w horses|strong="G2462"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w vision|strong="G3706"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w breastplates|strong="G2382"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4447"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w jacinth|strong="G5191"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brimstone|strong="G2306"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w heads|strong="G2776"\w* of the \w horses|strong="G2462"\w* \add were\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w heads|strong="G2776"\w* of \w lions|strong="G3023"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouths|strong="G4750"\w* \w issued|strong="G1607"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brimstone|strong="G2303"\w*.

\w By|strong="G5259"\w* \w these|strong="G5130"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* was the third \w part|strong="G5154"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w killed|strong="G0615"\w*, \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w brimstone|strong="G2303"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w issued|strong="G1607"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouths|strong="G4750"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w tails|strong="G3769"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w tails|strong="G3769"\w* \add were\add* like \w unto|strong="G3664"\w* \w serpents|strong="G3789"\w*, and \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* they do \w hurt|strong="G0091"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w rest|strong="G3062"\w* of the \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w were|strong="G0615"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w killed|strong="G0615"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w plagues|strong="G4127"\w* yet \w repented|strong="G3340"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* of \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they \w should|strong="G4352"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w devils|strong="G1140"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w idols|strong="G1497"\w* of \w gold|strong="G5552"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w silver|strong="G0693"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brass|strong="G5470"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w stone|strong="G3035"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w wood|strong="G3585"\w*: \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w see|strong="G0991"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*:

\w Neither|strong="G3756"\w* repented \w they|strong="G3340"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w murders|strong="G5408"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sorceries|strong="G5331"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w thefts|strong="G2809"\w*.
